q: `` I froze. My heart raced,'' he wrote. He was arrested in Osaka while waiting for a ferry to Okinawa. He refused to eat for two weeks after the arrest, but I could not die, he said.`` Before and after the escape, all I cared about was myself, after all.'' Eric Schmidt , 55, has no doubt Page is ready for the challenges ahead.`` Larry has been with me in every major decision in the past decade,'' Eric Schmidt said in an interview Thursday. Although management by committee worked well enough to turn Google into an enormous success, it eventually slowed Google's reaction to popular new ideas such as Facebook and Twitter.
